## Flexible Weibull extension distribution

In this vignette we explore the Flexible Weibull extension distribution.

The distribution was proposed by Bebbington (2007).

The pdf of the EW distribution is:
 
$$f(x) = \left( \mu+ \frac{\sigma}{x^2} \right) e^{\mu x - \sigma / x} \exp \left( -e^{\mu x - \sigma / x} \right), \quad x > 0,$$   
where $\mu > 0$ and $\sigma > 0$.
